chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Pritalle Nerbaijan, p. 44 (37)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah from Saldaea. She has green eyes, and an unusually small nose for a Saldaean. She is friends with Atuan, which makes those who know about Atuan suspicious that Pritalle may also be Black. See also Larisett, Atuan.
